about.en: I would describe myself as a very motivated person, towards both my job and my life as a whole. I am very passionate about transforming numbers into knowledge and using them for optimal decisions, while always thinking out of the box. I am always willing to do things, do them in the right way and, when possible, staying creative thinking out of the box. On a personal level, I consider myself to be a very positive person, with an easy smile and full of energy.
